solution_line_template: Twice the number of whiskers as Catman Do is {princess_puff_whiskers}*{multiplier_for_twice}=<<{princess_puff_whiskers}*{multiplier_for_twice}={twice_princess_puff}>>{twice_princess_puff} whiskers.

Catman Do has {less_than_twice} less than twice the number of whiskers as Princess puff, for a total of {twice_princess_puff}-{less_than_twice}=<<{twice_princess_puff}-{less_than_twice}={catman_do_whiskers}>>{catman_do_whiskers} whiskers.
